EmailTemplate.subject: September 29th Complimentary Webinar: Maximizing Your Sweet Billing Reports - Part 2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
September 29, 2011 Complimentary Webinar Maximizing the Use of Your Sweet Billing Reports - Part 2
We just couldn't fit in everything that everyone asked to see in this week's Sweet Billing Reports webinar, so we're doing a part two!
Please join us for the upcoming webinar: Maximizing the Use of Your Sweet-Billing Reports - Part 2 on Thursday, September 29th at 2 pm Eastern Time (1 pm CT | Noon MT | 11 am PT).
Your Presenters: Larry Cole and Michele Duwe, TriTech's EMS Solutions Sales Team In this upcoming webinar, you'll learn about the Sweet Billing Flex Report Generator.
Register Now: please copy and paste the below URL into your internet browser: http://offers.tritech.com/MaximizingtheUseofYourSweetBillingReportsPart2_Sept_29_2011_Registration.html
Questions? Contact Cheri Lane, TriTech's Marketing Communication Manager 800-537-3927, ext. #6278 cheri.lane@tritech.com
